title: [whinge] Over this game, too much buddy boosting and elo boosting
body:
its really demoralizing getting stomped by one person, watching them hardly miss any skillshots, play way above the elo... then it just slaps you in the face when you look up their history and all of a sudden after 800 games they are playing a lane and a champ which they havint played all season and completely dominate with it. and have near a 90% winrate since they started playing said lane/champ 15 games ago...


fk this game honestly, better things in life to worry about and explore.

replies.body:
Also, I think what you say can be a bit off. While boosting does exist, you aren't going to be encountering it every game or two.
I played a lot of Karma support, for example, then went mid as her and dominated a few games. Also, whenever I have started a new champ I have been able to land a heap of skillshots because nearly every character I have played has skillshots.

I agree that people do get boosted and that it is super common. Something that you are failing to realise, is that you can get good at a champion, so that you don't miss skill shots and can stomp enemies as well as getting near perfect cs. You can also do this 'gitting gud" without it being recorded in your match history;  just play custom games and don't kill a nexus. 
Seriously, I play custom games quite a bit to practice my CS and it has essentially doubled in the past couple of weeks. I also have great positioning and harass on champions that it would appear that I have never played before because I play custom games and lane against my high elo friends. Super awesome quality map awareness also comes with practice. Watching twitch streams and youtube guides can also help, as you learn to recognise the patterns of the game. 

So yeah, most people that you describe will be getting boosted, but some will have actually gotten good.
if boosting exists, then that means you can solo carry.

so true and if i cant carry its my fault also if i'm not a team player i cant win either

i'm at the this elo because i belong here i dont deny that. 

but they dont belong in my elo anymore than i belong in thiers.

yes they can carry out of this elo, but they are usually quite abit higher skillwise as well.. 


its like david becham playing soccer competitively agianst 5yr olds.. its just completely unfair and really not fun at all.

Your gonna have boosters, not much is gonna change that, play to learn and get better, not to win.

i think its a lack of moderation and control that there a quite alot atm.

willing to bet most get paid bucket loads and refuse to work real jobs.. prob also collect centrelink.


but meh
don't care, over it. 

uninstalled 5 min ago. no longer worth my time nor money

Elo boosting to a degree exist in all competitive games there is not much you can do, One positive way to deal with it is to study them since they are far above your elo just try doing things you see them doing

i agree and understand that but its just so common in this game its brutal. 

sometimes you get people who are just completely destroying the team and just constantly put the other team down.. 

i try my best to reflect, learn and improve
but in these games tbh i just switch off. its the only way i cope with it.
